There is a grunt from SCOURGE a=
s he heard the orders HYDRAS had given
to CYCLONUS. "We help the maximals?"=
 he said quietly. "What madness is
this? Warriors don't help their enemy."
=

"Quiet scourge. We follow Hydras now." CYCLONUS said ashe contemplated
HYD=
RAS' orders. "He has given an order, and we carry it out."

There was anoth=
er grunt from SCOURGE but he remained silent as around
them the other Preda=
cons went back to work, leaving CYCLONUS and his
crew to keep up with the M=
aimals.

"What we know is this." CYCLONUS said finally. "A being who identi=
fied
himself as Saberback was controlling these beasts with some sort of
ha=
rmonic energy wave of some sort. We defended ourselves and then when
we dis=
rupted his wave he fled, teleporting himself away to saftety."

"Yeah!" SCO=
URGE said, "Like the coward he is!"

"Anyway!" CYCLONUS continued, cutting =
off any further remarks from
SCOURGE. "The ones we didn't kill seemed to ha=
ve died after he left."

"Perhaps their fragile bodies just couldn't take t=
he stress from
running so hard." DEEPSTRYKE said from his position above th=
em. "My
scans indicate that they are without enhancement."

There was a tho=
ughtful pause from CYCLONUS, "That might be the case."
he said finally. "So=
 Maximal, You are caught up. Now what??"
